titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow certain expenses for overnight camps to qualify for the credit and exclusion relating to dependent care expenses.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1776-1777)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 8/19/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a limited amount of overnight camp expenses to qualify for the credit for dependent care services and the exclusion for dependent care assistance programs.
